summary: Chat application with X post link handling
architectural_notes: X post URLs in chat messages display as plain text 'X Post' with embedded preview below

existing_features.title: In the MessageBubble component, replace all X post URLs in message text with the plain text 'X Post' (non-clickable) while preserving the embedded X post previews below the message text

projectName: Replace X post URLs with plain text while preserving embeds
